attributes.long-description:
Introducing the Magic™ 2012 Gold Bundle: the Base Game, its Expansion, and its three Deck Packs, now available in one package.

Unleash an arsenal of deadly creatures and devastating spells as you battle across the Multiverse. And once you’ve mastered the Duels of the Planeswalkers® 2012 base game, prepare yourself for even more decks and challenges in the expansion and deck packs included in this bundle.

In the Expansion, face a new Planeswalker: Ral Zarek. Play with three additional decks, experience seventeen different single-player campaign levels and unlock four additional cards for all thirteen 2012 decks. Also, play as the Archenemy in an expanded multiplayer game mode playable online and locally!

Three additional Deck Packs allow you to play with six different decks in Campaign and Multiplayer play.

And all content comes packed with a host of additional features, including cards, achievements, co-op levels and much more!

Start dueling today!

(Game content available in English, French, Italian, German, and Spanish only.)

Wizards of the Coast, Magic: The Gathering, Duels of the Planeswalkers, and their respective logos are trademarks of Wizards of the Coast LLC in the U.S.A. and other countries. Other trademarks are property of their respective owners. ©2012 Wizards of the Coast LLC.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. This item has been sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America.
